TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_fence
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond_ore", "quantity": 60, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 4, "index": 31}, {"type": "ghast_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 33}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 14, "index": 34}]
thought: To craft a crimson_fence, I need to place 2 crimson_planks and 4 sticks in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first move 1 crimson_plank from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_fence

thought: I have already moved 1 crimson_plank to the crafting grid, so I now need to move 1 stick to the crafting grid. I will move 1 stick from slot 11 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
